entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy. Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain beginning before morning. Local blowing snow before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain in the morning. Local blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
